WorkItem.ClosedComment: This enchant was incorrectly being filtered by the Inscription Profession, fix checked in commit 44007
WorkItem.Description: I can not enchant Inscription of Triumph (40 Attack Power) for my shoulder at Rawr 2.3.1, but I can do it at Rawr 2.2.28.

Comments.Message: can you please attach your RAWR file so that we can see what you are talking about.
When I choose enchant for my shoulder, I can't find "Inscription of Triumph" at Rawr 2.3.1.
Ah, the resilience one... What model? Just post your character file, please.
Considering I see Sanctified Ahn'Kahar Blood Hunter's Headpiece in the loot list, I would wager Hunter module.
I tried my hunter, rogue and death knight, all are same. :-)
For Hunter you probably need to turn off the PvP filter on the Options Tab, that's killing the Enchant for it having Resilience.

"turn off the PvP filter on the Options Tab"
Sorry, I can find this option. Do you mean that uncheck "Comparisons -> Filters -> PVP" at right-side?
BTW, I can find "Arcanum of Triumph" for my head.
I mean, go to the Options Tab in Hunter and it's on the first sub-tab in a Group Box labeled Misc.
I uncheked "Hide spell gear" and "Hide PvP gear" in Hunter, but I still can not find "Inscription of Triumph", just only find "Arcanum of Triumph". :(

Got the same issue, no inscription of triumph in the list
whether in dpswarr, feraldruid, rogue, hunter - with or without unchecking the corresponding hide pvp gear options

noticed in 2.3.2.
